title: People dodging
body: So im in low silver after being demoted quite a few times and nearly every queue I am waiting 5mins+, most of the time 10, because of dodges. Why isn't dodging punished more? because it seems nothing happens when someone dodges.

replies.body: Do you mean failure to accept the game? Or in lobby dodging?

> [{quoted}](name=dragon poo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uT3Vdk69,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-09T10:07:52.947+0000)
>
> In lobby dodging

Well there are penalties for in lobby dodging. There are just a lot of players in low silver so you may experience it more than if you were higher or lower ranked i guess...

The person who dodges (if in rank) receive a 3LP loss or if they are in a promotion series they receive an automatic lost as well as 5 min leave buster. Same goes for the anyone who are a duo and dodges but instead receive a 10Lp loss or something around there

I find when I dodge once I get auto 5 min, twice is 10 and so on. When I see other people dodge they come right back next lobby like nothing happened. Seems like some people are favored or the system doesn't work.
